original_title: Thế Giới Huyền Bí, Tập 1: Tình Yêu Bất Diệt
overview: After suffering her third miscarriage, a young woman desperately struggles to sustain her health as well as her marriage. When she is haunted by bizarre visions and strange voices from beyond the grave, she discovers that her unhappiness is rooted, not in the present, but in the past.
title: Mysterious World, Episode 1: Love Never Dies
